cases.title: Cleveland Clinic – Heart Patient Support
cases.description: Help families cover parking, meals, and lodging while a loved one undergoes cardiac surgery at a major heart center.

cases.title: St. Jude – Pediatric Cancer Travel
cases.description: Provide travel stipends for families flying in for pediatric cancer treatment so money is never a reason to skip care.

cases.title: Mayo Clinic – Transplant Housing
cases.description: Support short-term housing for transplant patients and their caregivers staying near the hospital during recovery.

cases.title: Johns Hopkins – NICU Family Meals
cases.description: Parents of babies in the NICU can spend 12+ hours bedside. Fund hot meals so they don't have to choose between food and time with their child.

cases.title: Mass General – Emergency Hardship Fund
cases.description: A small emergency grant can keep the lights on or cover a co-pay after a sudden illness. You help social workers say 'yes'.
